<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><h-g eid="jagged_hg_1"><top-g> <h e_id="13cbabf992f.-7d28">jagged</h><pron careful="y" e eid="jagged_prongs_1" gs href="jagged_prongs_1" psg="ald8_jagged_prongs_1" resource="phonetics" source="ald8" status="2">Criminal justice<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>刑事审判</chn></titled></title><h2 eid="justice_h2_1" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4869" e_inline="y" tranID="1" status="6">Breaking the law<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>犯法</chn></h2><ul eid="justice_ul_1" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4868"><li eid="justice_li_1" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4867" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>break/violate/obey/uphold </eb>  the law<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>违反／违背／遵守／维护法律</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_2" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4865" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be investigated/arrested/tried for</eb>  a crime/a robbery/fraud<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>因犯罪／抢劫／诈骗而被调查／逮捕／审判</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_3" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4863" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be arrested/</eb>  <label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="n_am"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:am"><namelabel>NAmE</namelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk>  <eb>indicted/convicted</eb>  on charges of rape/fraud/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="usa"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:us"><em>US</em></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> felony charges<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>因被控犯强奸罪／诈骗罪／重型罪遭逮捕／起诉／定罪</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_4" e_id="13cbabf992f.-485c" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be arrested </eb>  on suspicion of arson/robbery/shoplifting<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>因涉嫌纵火／抢劫／在商店行窃而被逮捕</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_5" e_id="13cbabf992f.-485a" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be accused of/be charged with</eb>  murder/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="n_am"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:am"><namelabel>NAmE</namelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> homicide/four counts of fraud<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>被指控犯有谋杀罪／杀人罪／四项诈骗罪</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_6" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4856" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>face</eb>  two charges of indecent assault<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>面临两项猥亵罪的指控</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_7" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4854" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>admit</eb>  your guilt/liability/responsibility (for sth)<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>承认（对某事的）罪责／责任</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_8" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4852" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>deny</eb>  the allegations/claims/charges<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>否认指控</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_9" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4850" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>confess to</eb>  a crime<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>坦白罪行</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_10" e_id="13cbabf992f.-484e" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>grant/be refused/be released on/skip/jump</eb>  bail<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>准许／不准保释；交保释金获释；弃保潜逃</chn></und></li></ul><h2 eid="justice_h2_2" e_id="13cbabf992f.-484c" e_inline="y" tranID="12" status="6">The legal process<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>法律程序</chn></h2><ul eid="justice_ul_2" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabf992f.-484b"><li eid="justice_li_11" e_id="13cbabf992f.-484a" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>stand/await/bring sb to/come to/be on</eb>  trial<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>判刑与惩罚</chn></h2><ul eid="justice_ul_3" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabf992f.-481f"><li eid="justice_li_30" e_id="13cbabf992f.-481e" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>pass</eb>  sentence on jam tomorrow

</>

</>

<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><h-g eid="jazzy_hg_1"><top-g> <h <head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><h-g eid="jewelled_hg_1"><top-g> <h e_id="13cbabf992f.-6d38">jew·elled</h><v-gs-blk type="vf"> (<v-gs><v-g-blk><v-g><label-g-blk><label-g><geo-blk><geo e_id="13cbabf992f.-6d34" geo="usa"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:us"><em>US</em></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g> </label-g-blk><v-blk><v e_id="13cbabf992f.-6d33"><xhtml:a href="d:jew·eled">jew·eled</xhtml:a></v></v-blk></v-g></v-g-blk></v-gs>) </v-gs-blk><pron e eid="jewelled_prongs_1" gs href="jewelled_prongs_1" psg="ald8_jewelled_prongs_1" resource="phonetics" source="ald8" targeteltid="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.65a4283b.1430b409f97.-3b05" wd="jewelled"><pron-g-blk><brelabel><xhtml:a href="help:bre">BrE</xhtml:a></brelabel> <pron-g><xhtml:a href="help:phonetics"><phon-blk>/<phon>ˈdʒuːəld</phon>/</phon-blk><audio eid="jewelled_audio_1" name="jewelled__gb_1"></audio></xhtml:a></pron-g> <a href="snd://jewelled__gb_1.spx"><audio-gb>🔊</audio-gb></a></pron-g-blk><pron-g-blk><xhtml:br></xhtml:br><namelabel><xhtml:a href="help:name">NAmE</xhtml:a></namelabel> <pron-g><xhtml:a href="help:phonetics"><phon-blk>/<phon>ˈdʒuːəld</phon>/</phon-blk><audio eid="jewelled_audio_2" name="jewelled__us_1"></audio></xhtml:a></pron-g> <a href="snd://jewelled__us_1.spx"><audio-us>🔊</audio-us></a></pron-g-blk></pron-gs><pos-g eid="jewelled_posg_1"> <pos-blk><pos><xhtml:a href="helpp:adj">adjective</xhtml:a></pos></pos-blk></pos-g></top-g><sn-gs eid="jewelled_sngs_1"><sn-blk-nolist><sn-g eid="jewelled_sng_1"><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:decorated">decorated</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:with">with</xhtml:a> <ndv eid="jewelled_ndv_1" xt="andv"><xhtml:a href="d:jewels">jewels</xhtml:a></ndv><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>饰以宝石的；镶有宝石的</chn></def></sn-g></sn-blk-nolist></sn-gs></h-g>

jeweller

travel agent/tour operator<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>联系旅行社；向旅行社咨询</chn></und></li><li eid="travel_li_35" e_id="13cbac587f0.-55c5" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>book/be on/go on</eb>  a package souvenirs<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>购买／带回（低劣的／定价过高的）纪念品</chn></und></li></ul></body></unbox></sn-g></licontent></xhtml:li></xhtml:ol></sn-blk></sn-gs></h-g>
</>

<xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:do">do</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="help:sth">sth</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:difficult">difficult</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>（事前的）紧张不安</chn></def><x-gs eid="jitters_xgs_1"><x-g-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-6861" eid="jitters_xg_1"><xsymb><xhtml:a jittery

frightened way.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>以上各词均形容人神经质、易紧张焦虑、胆怯。</chn></und></p><ul eid="nervous_ul_2" class="deflist" e_id="13cbac08c92.6bff"><li eid="nervous_li_4" e_id="13cbac08c92.6c00" 词条。</chn></un></li><li eid="nervous_li_5" e_id="13cbac08c92.6c08" e_inline="y"><unsyn>neurotic</unsyn> <und margined="n"> not behaving in a reasonable, calm way, because you are worried about jive

status="6">job or position?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>用 job 还是 position？</chn></h3><p eid="job_p_2" e_id="13cbabf992f.-6692" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>Position</eb>  usually refers to a particular job within an organization, especially at a high level, and is not usually used about jobs generally. It is also often used in job applications, descriptions and advertisements.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>position 通常指机构中的职位，尤指高级职位，通常不用以指一般的工作。该词亦常用于工作申请、职位描述和招聘广告中。</chn></und></p><ul eid="job_ul_3" Joe Public

jog along
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><pv-g e_id="13cbabf992f.-62ec" eid="jog_pvg_1"><top-g><pv-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-62ea" eid="jog_pv_1"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addpv:13cbabf992f.-62ea">●</xhtml:a></xsymb><pv e_id="13cbabf992f.-62ea" eid="jog_pv_1"><xhtml:a href="xp:jog">ˌjog</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xp:along">aˈlong</xhtml:a></pv></pv-blk></top-g><sn-gs eid="jog_sngs_3"><sn-blk><sn-g eid="jog_sng_4" n=""><label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo e_id="13cbabf992f.-62e6" geo="br"><xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo>, </geo-blk><reg-blk><reg e_id="13cbabf992f.-62e5" reg="infml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:infml">informal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:continue">continue</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:as">as</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:usual">usual</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:with">with</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:little">little</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:or">or</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:no">no</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:excitement">excitement</xhtml:a>, <xhtml:a href="d:change">change</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:or">or</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:progress">progress</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>（同往常一样）缓慢而平稳地进行</chn></def></sn-g></sn-blk></sn-gs></pv-g><div class="seealso">See also <a href="entry://jog">jog</a></div>

jog along
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><pv-g e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.46f54337.1428c2247eb.-4fcc" eid=""><top-g><pv-blk e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.46f54337.1428c2247eb.-4fca" eid=""><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addpv:u4cdebea65f7df6b4.46f54337.1428c2247eb.-4fca">●</xhtml:a></xsymb><pv e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.46f54337.1428c2247eb.-4fca" eid=""><xhtml:a href="xp:jog">jog</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xp:along">aˈlong</xhtml:a></pv></pv-blk><pv-blk e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.46f54337.1428c2247eb.-4fc9" eid=""><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addpv:u4cdebea65f7df6b4.46f54337.1428c2247eb.-4fc9">●</xhtml:a></xsymb><pv e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.46f54337.1428c2247eb.-4fc9" eid=""><xhtml:a href="xp:jog">jog</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xp:on">ˈon</xhtml:a></pv></pv-blk></top-g><sn-gs><sn-blk><sn-g eid="" n=""><label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.46f54337.1428c2247eb.-4fc5" geo="br"><xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo>, </geo-blk><reg-blk><reg e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.46f54337.1428c2247eb.-4fc4" reg="infml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:infml">informal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:used">used</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:tell">tell</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="help:sb">sb</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:rudely">rudely</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:go">go</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:away">away</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:or">or</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:that">that</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:you">you</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:are">are</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:not">not</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:interested">interested</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>（粗鲁地让人走开，或表示自己没兴趣）走开，一边去</chn></def></sn-g></sn-blk></sn-gs></pv-g><div class="seealso">See also <a href="entry://jog">jog</a></div>

e_id="13cbabc708f.627f" e_inline="y" tranID="13" status="6">Healthy eating<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>健康的饮食</chn></h2><ul eid="diet_ul_2" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabc708f.6280"><li eid="diet_li_12" smoking<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>戒烟</chn></und></li></ul><h2 eid="diet_h2_3" e_id="13cbabc708f.6294" e_inline="y" tranID="21" status="6">Exercise <chnsep> </chnsep><chn>锻炼</chn></h2><ul eid="diet_ul_3" the gym<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>去健身房锻炼</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_24" e_id="13cbabc708f.62a5" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>strengthen/tone/train</eb>  your stomach muscles<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>增强／锻炼腹肌</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_25" e_id="13cbabc708f.62a7" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>contract/relax/stretch/use/work</eb>  your lower-body muscles <chnsep> </chnsep><chn>收缩／放松／伸展／使用／锻炼下肢的肌肉</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_26" e_id="13cbabc708f.62a9" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>build (up)/gain</eb>  muscle<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>增强肌肉</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_27" e_id="13cbabc708f.62ab" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>improve/increase</eb>  your stamina/energy levels/physical fitness<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>增强耐力／体能／体质</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_28" e_id="13cbabc708f.62ad" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>burn/consume/expend</eb>  calories<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>消耗热量</chn></und></li></ul><h2 eid="diet_h2_4" e_id="13cbabc708f.62af" e_inline="y" tranID="32" status="6">Staying healthy<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>保持健康</chn></h2><ul eid="diet_ul_4" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabc708f.62b0"><li eid="diet_li_29" e_id="13cbabc708f.62b1" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be/get/keep/stay</eb>  healthy/in shape/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="br"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> fit <chnsep> </chnsep><chn>身体健康；变得／保持健康</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_30" e_id="13cbabc708f.62b5" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>lower</eb>  your cholesterol/blood pressure<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>降低胆固醇／血压</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_31" e_id="13cbabc708f.62b7" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>boost/stimulate/strengthen</eb>  your immune system<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>增强免疫力</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_32" e_id="13cbabc708f.62b9" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>prevent/reduce the risk of</eb>  heart disease/high blood pressure/diabetes/osteoporosis<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>预防／减少患心脏病／高血压／糖尿病／骨质疏松的风险</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_33" e_id="13cbabc708f.62bb" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>reduce/relieve/manage/combat</eb>  stress <chnsep> </chnsep><chn>缓解／控制压力</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_34" e_id="13cbabc708f.62bd" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>enhance/promote</eb>  relaxation/physical and mental well-being<chnsep> </>
jogging suit

@@@LINK=jogtrot
</>

e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>play</eb>  football/hockey/tennis<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>玩足球／曲棍球／网球</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_22" e_id="13cbabc708f.629e" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>go</eb>  cycling/jogging/running<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>骑自行车；慢跑；跑步</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_" e_id="13cbabc708f.62a0" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>go to/visit/</eb>  <label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="n_am"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:am"><namelabel>NAmE</namelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk>  <eb>hit/work out at</eb>  the gym<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>去健身房锻炼</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_24" e_id="13cbabc708f.62a5" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>strengthen/tone/train</eb>  your stomach muscles<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>增强／锻炼腹肌</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_25" e_id="13cbabc708f.62a7" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>contract/relax/stretch/use/work</eb>  your lower-body muscles <chnsep> </chnsep><chn>收缩／放松／伸展／使用／锻炼下肢的肌肉</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_26" e_id="13cbabc708f.62a9" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>build (up)/gain</eb>  muscle<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>增强肌肉</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_27" e_id="13cbabc708f.62ab" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>improve/increase</eb>  your stamina/energy levels/physical fitness<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>消耗热量</chn></und></li></ul><h2 eid="diet_h2_4" e_id="13cbabc708f.62af" e_inline="y" tranID="32" status="6">Staying healthy<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>保持健康</chn></h2><ul eid="diet_ul_4" eid="diet_li_30" e_id="13cbabc708f.62b5" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>lower</eb>  your cholesterol/blood pressure<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>降低胆固醇／血压</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_31" e_id="13cbabc708f.62b7" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>boost/stimulate/strengthen</eb>  your immune system<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>增强免疫力</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_32" e_id="13cbabc708f.62b9" </>

Johnny Reb

</chnsep><chn>消耗热量</chn></und></li></ul><h2 eid="diet_h2_4" e_id="13cbabc708f.62af" e_inline="y" tranID="32" status="6">Staying healthy<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>保持健康</chn></h2><ul eid="diet_ul_4" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabc708f.62b0"><li eid="diet_li_29" e_id="13cbabc708f.62b1" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be/get/keep/stay</eb>  healthy/in shape/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="br"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> fit <chnsep> </chnsep><chn>身体健康；变得／保持健康</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_30" e_id="13cbabc708f.62b5" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>lower</eb>  your cholesterol/blood pressure<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>降低胆固醇／血压</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_31" e_id="13cbabc708f.62b7" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>boost/stimulate/strengthen</eb>  your immune system<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>增强免疫力</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_32" e_id="13cbabc708f.62b9" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>prevent/reduce the risk of</eb>  heart disease/high blood pressure/diabetes/osteoporosis<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>预防／减少患心脏病／高血压／糖尿病／骨质疏松的风险</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_33" e_id="13cbabc708f.62bb" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>reduce/relieve/manage/combat</eb>  stress <chnsep> </chnsep><chn>缓解／控制压力</chn></und></li><li eid="diet_li_34" e_id="13cbabc708f.62bd" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>enhance/promote</eb>  relaxation/physical and mental well-being<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>有助于身体放松／身心健康</chn></und></li></ul></body></unbox></sn-gs></h-g>
</>

</>
jolly good!
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><idm-g e_id="13cbabf992f.-5d33" eid="jolly_idmg_1"><top-g><idm-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-5d31" eid="jolly_idm_1"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addid:13cbabf992f.-5d31">●</xhtml:a></xsymb><idm e_id="13cbabf992f.-5d31" eid="jolly_idm_1"><xhtml:a href="xi:jolly">jolly</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xi:good">ˈgood</xhtml:a>!</idm></idm-blk></top-g><sn-gs eid="jolly_sngs_4"><sn-blk><sn-g eid="jolly_sng_5" n=""><label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><reg e_id="13cbabf992f.-5d2d" reg="oldfash"><xhtml:a href="helpr:oldfash">old-fashioned</xhtml:a></reg>, </reg-blk><geo-blk> <geo e_id="13cbabf992f.-5d2c" geo="br"><xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo>, </geo-blk><reg-blk><reg e_id="13cbabf992f.-5d2b" reg="infml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:infml">informal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:used">used</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:show">show</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:that">that</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:you">you</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:approve">approve</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:of">of</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="help:sth">sth</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:that">that</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="help:sb">sb</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:has">has</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:just">just</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:said">said</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>（赞同别人说的话）非常好，太好了</chn></def></sn-g></sn-blk></sn-gs></idm-g><div class="seealso">See also <a href="entry://jolly">jolly</a></div>

jollying
@@@LINK=jolly
</>
jolly sb along
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><pv-g eid="jolly_pvg_1"><top-g><pv-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-5ced" eid="jolly_pv_1"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addpv:13cbabf992f.-5ced">●</xhtml:a></xsymb><pv e_id="13cbabf992f.-5ced" eid="jolly_pv_1"><xhtml:a href="xp:jolly">ˌjolly</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xp:sb">sb</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xp:along">aˈlong</xhtml:a></pv></pv-blk></top-g><sn-gs eid="jolly_sngs_7"><sn-blk><sn-g eid="jolly_sng_8" n=""><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:encourage">encourage</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="help:sb">sb</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:in">in</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:a">a</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:cheerful">cheerful</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:way">way</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>（用愉快的方式）鼓励某人</chn></def></sn-g></sn-blk></sn-gs></pv-g><div class="seealso">See also <a href="entry://jolly">jolly</a></div>

jolly sb into sth/into doing sth

jolly sb/sth up
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><pv-g eid="jolly_pvg_3"><top-g><pv-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-5ce1" eid="jolly_pv_3"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addpv:13cbabf992f.-5ce1">●</xhtml:a></xsymb><pv e_id="13cbabf992f.-5ce1" eid="jolly_pv_3"><xhtml:a href="xp:jolly">ˌjolly</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xp:sb">sb</xhtml:a>/<xhtml:a href="xp:sth">sth</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xp:up">ˈup</xhtml:a></pv></pv-blk></top-g><sn-gs eid="jolly_sngs_9"><sn-blk><sn-g eid="jolly_sng_10" n=""><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:make">make</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="help:sb">sb</xhtml:a>/<xhtml:a href="help:sth">sth</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:more">more</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:cheerful">cheerful</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>使更有生气；使更快活</chn></def></sn-g></sn-blk></sn-gs></pv-g><div class="seealso">See also <a href="entry://jolly">jolly</a></div>

jolly well

jolt

href="d:record">record</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:of">of</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:the">the</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:things">things</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:you">you</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="snd://_journey__ams_8.spx"><audio-ams-liju>🔊</audio-ams-liju></a></rx-g></x-g-blk></x-gs><unbox type="synonyms" Name="trip" eid="trip_unbox_1" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f5e"><body eid="trip_body_1" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f5d"><title eid="trip_h1_1" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f5c" e_inline="y"><titled tranID="30" status="1">trip</titled></title><inlinelist><und margined="n">journey</und> ◇ <und margined="n">tour</und> ◇ <und margined="n">expedition</und> ◇ <und margined="n">excursion</und> ◇ <und margined="n">outing</und> ◇ <und margined="n">day out</und></inlinelist><p eid="trip_p_1" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f54" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">These are all words for an act of travelling to a place.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>以上各词均指旅行、旅游。</chn></und></p><ul eid="trip_ul_2" class="deflist" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f53"><li eid="trip_li_7" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f52" e_inline="y"><unsyn>trip</unsyn> <und margined="n"> an act of travelling from one place to another, and usually back again<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>通常指往返的旅行</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="trip_xgs_3" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f50"><x-g-blk eid="trip_xg_9"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="trip_x_9" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f4e" e_inline="y" tranID="5" status="6">a business trip<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>出差</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="trip_xg_10"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="trip_x_10" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f4c" e_inline="y" tranID="7" status="6">a five-minute trip by taxi<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>五分钟的出租车车程</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="trip_li_8" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f4b" e_inline="y"><unsyn>journey</unsyn> <und margined="n"> an act of travelling from one place to another, especially when they are a long way apart<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>尤指长途旅行</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="trip_xgs_4" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f49"><x-g-blk eid="trip_xg_11"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="trip_x_11" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f47" e_inline="y" tranID="9" status="6">a long and difficult journey across the mountains<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>漫长而艰难的翻山旅行</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="trip_h3_1" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f46" e_inline="y" tranID="10" status="6">trip or journey?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>用 trip 还是 journey？</chn></h3><p eid="trip_p_2" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f45" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">A  <eb>trip</eb>  usually involves you going to a place and back again; a  <eb>journey</eb>  is usually one-way. A  <eb>trip</eb>  is often shorter than a  <eb>journey</eb>, although it does not have to be.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>trip 通常为往返旅行，journey 通常为单程旅行。trip 的行程常较 journey 短，但并非一定如此</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="trip_xgs_5" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f40"><x-g-blk eid="trip_xg_12"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="trip_x_12" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f3e" e_inline="y" tranID="12" status="6">a trip to New York<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>去纽约的旅行</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="trip_xg_13"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="trip_x_13" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f3c" e_inline="y" tranID="14" status="6">a round-the-world trip<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>环球旅行</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs><und margined="y">It is often short in time, even if it is long in distance.  <eb>Journey</eb>  is more often used when the travelling takes a long time and is difficult. In North American English  <eb>journey</eb>  is not used for short trips.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>即使距离远，trip 所花时间常常不长。如果旅程长且艰难较常用 journey。在美式英语中，journey 不用以指短途旅行</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="trip_xgs_6" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f37"><x-g-blk eid="trip_xg_14"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="br"><xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk><x eid="trip_x_14" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f35" e_inline="y" tranID="37" status="2">What is your journey to work like?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>你上班的路程如何？</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></p><ul eid="trip_ul_3" class="deflist" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f34"><li eid="trip_li_9" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f33" e_inline="y"><unsyn>tour</unsyn> <und margined="n"> a journey made for pleasure during which several different places are visited<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指游览多地的旅行、旅游</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="trip_xgs_7" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f31"><x-g-blk eid="trip_xg_15"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="trip_x_15" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f2f" e_inline="y" tranID="18" status="6">a tour of Bavaria<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>巴伐利亚之旅</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="trip_li_10" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f2e" e_inline="y"><unsyn>expedition</unsyn> <und margined="n"> an organized journey with a particular purpose, especially to find out about a place that is not well known<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指远征、探险、考察</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="trip_xgs_8" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f2c"><x-g-blk eid="trip_xg_16"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="trip_x_16" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f2a" e_inline="y" tranID="20" status="6">the first expedition to the South Pole<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>首次去南极的探险</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="trip_li_11" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f29" e_inline="y"><unsyn>excursion</unsyn> <und margined="n"> a short trip made for pleasure, especially one that has been organized for a group of people<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>尤指集体远足、短途旅行</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="trip_xgs_9" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f27"><x-g-blk eid="trip_xg_17"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="trip_x_17" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f25" e_inline="y" tranID="22" status="6">We went on an all-day excursion to the island.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>我们到岛上去游览了一整天。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="trip_li_12" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f24" e_inline="y"><unsyn>outing</unsyn> <und margined="n"> a short trip made for pleasure or education, usually with a group of people and lasting no more than a day<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指集体出外游玩或学习，通常不超过一天</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="trip_xgs_10" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f22"><x-g-blk eid="trip_xg_18"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="trip_x_18" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f20" e_inline="y" tranID="24" status="6">The children were on a day's outing from school.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>孩子们离校游览了一天。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="trip_li_13" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f1f" e_inline="y"><unsyn>day out</unsyn> <und margined="n"> a trip to somewhere for a day, especially for pleasure<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指一日游</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="trip_xgs_11" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f1d"><x-g-blk eid="trip_xg_19"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="trip_x_19" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f1b" e_inline="y" tranID="26" status="6">We had a day out at the beach.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>我们在海滩玩了一天。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="trip_h3_2" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f1a" e_inline="y" tranID="38" status="1">Patterns</h3><ul eid="trip_ul_4" class="bullet" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f19"><li eid="trip_li_14" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f18" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">a(n)  <eb>foreign/overseas</eb> journo
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><h-g eid="journo_hg_1"><top-g> <h e_id="13cbabf992f.-5a16">journo</h><infl e_id="13cbabf992f.-5a14"></infl><infl e_id="13cbabf992f.-5a13"></infl><pron e eid="journo_prongs_1" gs href="journo_prongs_1" psg="ald8_journo_prongs_1" href="help:phonetics"><phon-blk>/<phon>ˈdʒɜːnəʊ</phon>/</phon-blk><audio eid="journo_audio_1" name="journo__gb_1"></audio></xhtml:a></pron-g> <a href="snd://journo__gb_1.spx"><audio-gb>🔊</audio-gb></a></pron-g-blk><pron-g-blk><xhtml:br></xhtml:br><namelabel><xhtml:a href="help:name">NAmE</xhtml:a></namelabel> <pron-g><xhtml:a href="snd://_joy__uss_2.spx"><audio-uss-liju>🔊</audio-uss-liju></a></rx-g></x-g-blk></x-gs><unbox type="synonyms" Name="pleasure" eid="pleasure_unbox_1" e_id="13cbac21463.7141"><body eid="pleasure_body_1" e_id="13cbac21463.7142"><title eid="pleasure_h1_1" e_id="13cbac21463.7143" e_inline="y"><titled tranID="22" status="1">pleasure</titled></title><inlinelist><und margined="n">delight</und> ◇ <und margined="n">joy</und> ◇ <und margined="n">privilege</und> ◇ <und margined="n">treat</und> ◇ <und margined="n">honour</und></inlinelist><p eid="pleasure_p_1" e_id="13cbac21463.714a" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">These are all words for things that make you happy or bring you enjoyment.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>以上各词均指令人愉快、高兴的事。</chn></und></p><ul eid="pleasure_ul_2" class="deflist" e_id="13cbac21463.714b"><li eid="pleasure_li_6" e_id="13cbac21463.714c" e_inline="y"><unsyn>pleasure</unsyn> <und margined="n"> a thing that brings you enjoyment or satisfaction<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指乐事、快事</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="pleasure_xgs_6" e_id="13cbac21463.714e"><x-g-blk eid="pleasure_xg_17"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="pleasure_x_17" e_id="13cbac21463.7150" e_inline="y" tranID="5" status="6">the pleasures and pains of everyday life<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>日常生活的苦与乐</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="pleasure_xg_18"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="pleasure_x_18" e_id="13cbac21463.7152" e_inline="y" tranID="7" status="6"> <ebi>It's been a pleasure</ebi> meeting you.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>很高兴认识您。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="pleasure_li_7" e_id="13cbac21463.7154" e_inline="y"><unsyn>delight</unsyn> <und margined="n"> a thing or person that brings you great enjoyment or satisfaction<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指令人高兴的事或人、乐事、乐趣</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="pleasure_xgs_7" e_id="13cbac21463.7156"><x-g-blk eid="pleasure_xg_19"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="pleasure_x_19" e_id="13cbac21463.7158" e_inline="y" tranID="9" status="6">the delights of living in the country<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>生活在乡村的乐趣</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="pleasure_li_8" e_id="13cbac21463.7159" e_inline="y"><unsyn>joy</unsyn> <und margined="n"> a thing or person that brings you great enjoyment or happiness<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指令人高兴的事或人、乐事、乐趣</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="pleasure_xgs_8" e_id="13cbac21463.715b"><x-g-blk eid="pleasure_xg_20"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="pleasure_x_20" e_id="13cbac21463.715d" e_inline="y" tranID="11" status="6">the joys and sorrows of childhood<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>童年的欢乐与悲伤</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="pleasure_h3_1" e_id="13cbac21463.715e" e_inline="y" tranID="12" status="6">pleasure, delight or joy?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>用 pleasure、delight 还是 joy？</chn></h3><p eid="pleasure_p_2" e_id="13cbac21463.715f" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">A  <eb>delight</eb>  or  <eb>joy</eb>  is greater than a  <eb>pleasure</eb>; a person, especially a child, can be a  <eb>delight</eb>  or  <eb>joy</eb>, but not a  <eb>pleasure</eb>;  <eb>joys</eb>  are often contrasted with  <eb>sorrows</eb>, but  <eb>delights</eb>  are not.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>delight 和 joy 语气较 pleasure 强。令人高兴的人，尤其是孩子，可以是一种 delight 或 joy，但不能是一种 pleasure。joys 常与 sorrows 形成对比，但 delights 无这种对比。</chn></und></p><ul eid="pleasure_ul_3" class="deflist" e_id="13cbac21463.7169"><li eid="pleasure_li_9" e_id="13cbac21463.716a" e_inline="y"><unsyn>privilege</unsyn> <und margined="n"> <label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><q>rather</q> <reg reg="fml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:fml">formal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> something that you are proud and lucky to have the opportunity to do<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指荣幸、荣耀、光荣</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="pleasure_xgs_9" e_id="13cbac21463.716d"><x-g-blk eid="pleasure_xg_21"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="pleasure_x_21" e_id="13cbac21463.716f" e_inline="y" tranID="19" status="6">It was a great privilege to hear her sing.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>听她唱歌是莫大的荣幸。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="pleasure_li_10" e_id="13cbac21463.7170" e_inline="y"><unsyn>treat</unsyn> <und margined="n"><label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><reg reg="infml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:infml">informal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> a thing that sb enjoyed or is likely to enjoy very much<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指乐事、乐趣</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="pleasure_xgs_10" e_id="13cbac21463.7173"><x-g-blk eid="pleasure_xg_22"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="pleasure_x_22" e_id="13cbac21463.7175" e_inline="y" tranID="15" status="6">You've never been to this area before? Then you're <ebi>in for a </ebi> real <ebi>treat</ebi>.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>你以前从来没有到过这一地区？那么你一定会喜之不尽。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="pleasure_li_11" e_id="13cbac21463.7178" e_inline="y"><unsyn>honour/honor</unsyn> <und margined="n"><label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><reg reg="fml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:fml">formal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> something that you are very pleased or proud to do because people are showing you great respect<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指荣幸、光荣</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="pleasure_xgs_11" e_id="13cbac21463.717b"><x-g-blk eid="pleasure_xg_"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="pleasure_x_" e_id="13cbac21463.717d" e_inline="y" tranID="21" status="6">It was a great honour to be invited here today.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>今天承蒙邀请到此，深感荣幸。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="pleasure_h3_2" e_id="13cbac21463.717e" e_inline="y" tranID="28" status="1">Patterns</h3><ul eid="pleasure_ul_4" class="bullet" joyful
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><h-g eid="joyful_hg_1"><top-g> <h e_id="13cbabf992f.-591f">joy·ful</h><topic e_id="13cbabf992f.-591e" eid="joyful_topic_1" l1="Personality and emotions" l2="Emotions" l3="Happiness"></topic><pron e eid="joyful_prongs_1" gs href="joyful_prongs_1" psg="ald8_joyful_prongs_1" resource="phonetics" source="ald8" targeteltid="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.65a4283b.1430b409f97.-3218" wd="joyful"><pron-g-blk><brelabel><xhtml:a href="help:bre">BrE</xhtml:a></brelabel> <pron-g><xhtml:a href="help:phonetics"><phon-blk>/<phon>ˈdʒɔɪfl</phon>/</phon-blk><audio eid="joyful_audio_1" name="joyful__gb_1"></audio></xhtml:a></pron-g> <a href="snd://joyful__gb_1.spx"><audio-gb>🔊</audio-gb></a></pron-g-blk><pron-g-blk><xhtml:br></xhtml:br><namelabel><xhtml:a href="help:name">NAmE</xhtml:a></namelabel> <pron-g><xhtml:a href="help:phonetics"><phon-blk>/<phon>ˈdʒɔɪfl</phon>/</phon-blk><audio eid="joyful_audio_2" name="joyful__us_1"></audio></xhtml:a></pron-g> <a href="snd://joyful__us_1.spx"><audio-us>🔊</audio-us></a></pron-g-blk></pron-gs><pos-g eid="joyful_posg_1"> <pos-blk><pos><xhtml:a href="helpp:adj">adjective</xhtml:a></pos></pos-blk></pos-g></top-g><sn-gs eid="joyful_sngs_1"><sn-blk-nolist><sn-g eid="joyful_sng_1"><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:very">very</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:happy">happy</xhtml:a>; <xhtml:a href="d:causing">causing</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:people">people</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:be">be</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:happy">happy</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>高兴的；快乐的；令人愉快的</chn></def><unbox type="synonyms" Name="happy" eid="happy_unbox_1" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51f4"><body eid="happy_body_1" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51f3"><title eid="happy_h1_1" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51f2" e_inline="y"><titled tranID="25" status="1">happy</titled></title><inlinelist><und margined="n">satisfied</und> ◇ <und margined="n">content</und> ◇ <und margined="n">contented</und> ◇ <und margined="n">joyful</und> ◇ <und margined="n">blissful</und></inlinelist><p eid="happy_p_1" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51eb" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">These words all describe feeling, showing or giving pleasure or satisfaction.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>以上各词均表示快乐、愉快、满意。</chn></und></p><ul eid="happy_ul_2" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51ea"><li eid="happy_li_6" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51e9" e_inline="y"><unsyn>happy</unsyn> <und margined="n">feeling, showing or giving pleasure; satisfied with sth or not worried about it<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指快乐的、满意的、放心的</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="happy_xgs_10" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51e7"><x-g-blk eid="happy_xg_25"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="happy_x_25" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51e5" e_inline="y" tranID="5" status="6">a happy marriage/memory/childhood<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>幸福的婚姻／回忆／童年</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="happy_xg_26"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="happy_x_26" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51e3" e_inline="y" tranID="7" status="6">I said I'd go, just to <ebi>keep him happy</ebi>.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>我说我要去只是为了让他高兴。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="happy_li_7" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51e1" e_inline="y"><unsyn>satisfied</unsyn> <und margined="n">pleased because you have achieved sth or because sth has happened as you wanted it to; showing this satisfaction<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指满意的、满足的、欣慰的</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="happy_xgs_11" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51df"><x-g-blk eid="happy_xg_27"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="happy_x_27" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51dd" e_inline="y" tranID="9" status="6">She's never satisfied with what she's got.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>她对自己所得到的从不感到满足。</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="happy_xg_28"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="happy_x_28" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51db" e_inline="y" tranID="11" status="6">a satisfied smile<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>满意的微笑</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="happy_li_8" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51da" e_inline="y"><unsyn>content</unsyn> <und margined="n"><gram-g><gram-blk> [<gram e_id=""><xhtml:a href="helpgr:nbn">not before noun</xhtml:a></gram>] </gram-blk></gram-g> happy and satisfied with what you have<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指满意、满足</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="happy_xgs_12" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51d8"><x-g-blk eid="happy_xg_29"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="happy_x_29" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51d6" e_inline="y" tranID="13" status="6">I'm perfectly <ebi>content just to</ebi> lie in the sun.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>我在阳光下躺着就感到非常满足。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="happy_li_9" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51d4" e_inline="y"><unsyn>contented</unsyn> <und margined="n">happy and comfortable with what you have; showing this<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指满意的、满足的、惬意的</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="happy_xgs_13" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51d2"><x-g-blk eid="happy_xg_30"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="happy_x_30" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51d0" e_inline="y" tranID="15" status="6">a contented baby<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>心满意足的小宝贝</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="happy_xg_31"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="happy_x_31" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51ce" e_inline="y" tranID="17" status="6">a long contented sigh<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>惬意的长叹</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="happy_h3_1" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51cd" e_inline="y" tranID="18" status="6">content or contented?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>用 content 还是 contented？</chn></h3><p eid="happy_p_2" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51cc" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">Being  <eb>contented</eb>  depends more on having a comfortable life; being  <eb>content</eb>  can depend more on your attitude to your life: you can <ei eid="happy_ei_1" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51c9">have to be content</ei> or <ei eid="happy_ei_2" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51c8">learn to be content</ei>. People or animals can be  <eb>contented</eb>  but only people can be  <eb>content</eb>.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>contented 多指因生活舒适而惬意；content 多指对生活的态度，可以用 have to be content（只好知足）或 learn to be content（学会知足）。人和动物均可用 contented，但只有人才能用 content。</chn></und></p><ul eid="happy_ul_3" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51c5"><li eid="happy_li_10" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51c4" e_inline="y"><unsyn>joyful</unsyn> <und margined="n"><label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><q>rather</q> <reg reg="fml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:fml">formal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> very happy; making people very happy<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指高兴的、快乐的、令人愉快的</chn></und></li><li eid="happy_li_11" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51c1" e_inline="y"><unsyn>blissful</unsyn> <und margined="n">making people very happy; showing this happiness<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指令人愉快的、极乐的、幸福的</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="happy_xgs_14" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51bf"><x-g-blk eid="happy_xg_32"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="happy_x_32" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51bd" e_inline="y" tranID="22" status="6">three blissful weeks away<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>无忧无虑的三周假期</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="happy_h3_2" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51bc" e_inline="y" tranID="23" status="6">joyful or blissful?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>用 joyful 还是 blissful？</chn></h3><ul eid="happy_ul_4" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51bb"><li eid="happy_li_12" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51ba" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>Joy</eb>  is a livelier feeling;  <eb>bliss</eb>  is more peaceful.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>joy 较活跃和富活力，bliss 则较平和。</chn></und></li></ul><h3 eid="happy_h3_3" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51b7" e_inline="y" tranID="31" status="1">Patterns</h3><ul eid="happy_ul_5" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51b6"><li eid="happy_li_13" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51b5" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">happy/satisfied/content/contented  <eb>with</eb>  sth</und></li><li eid="happy_li_14" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51b3" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">a happy/satisfied/contented/blissful  <eb>smile</eb> </und></li><li eid="happy_li_15" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51b1" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">a happy/joyful juice

</>

junior

e_inline="y" tranID="24" status="6">Be careful not to damage other people's property.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>小心别损坏别人的财物。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="thing_li_11" e_id="13cbac5155c.11e6" e_inline="y"><unsyn>possessions</unsyn> <und margined="n"> things that you own, especially sth that can be moved<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指个人财产、私人物品（尤指动产）</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="thing_xgs_35" e_id="13cbac5155c.11e8"><x-g-blk eid="thing_xg_69"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="thing_x_69" e_id="13cbac5155c.11ea" e_inline="y" tranID="11" status="6">Prisoners were allowed no personal possessions except letters and photographs.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>囚犯除信件和照片外不允许有任何私人物品。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="thing_li_12" e_id="13cbac5155c.11eb" e_inline="y"><unsyn>junk</unsyn> <und margined="n"><gram-g><gram-blk> [<gram e_id=""><xhtml:a href="helpgr:u">uncountable</xhtml:a></gram>] </gram-blk></gram-g> things that are considered useless or of little value<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指无用的东西、无价值的东西</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="thing_xgs_36" e_id="13cbac5155c.11ed"><x-g-blk eid="thing_xg_70"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="thing_x_70" e_id="13cbac5155c.11ef" e_inline="y" tranID="13" status="6">I've cleared out all that old junk from the attic.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>我把阁楼里所有的废旧杂物都清除干净了。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="thing_li_13" e_id="13cbac5155c.11f0" e_inline="y"><unsyn>belongings</unsyn> <und margined="n"> possessions that can be moved, especially ones that you have with you at a particular time<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指动产，尤指随身物品</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="thing_xgs_37" e_id="13cbac5155c.11f2"><x-g-blk eid="thing_xg_71"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="thing_x_71" e_id="13cbac5155c.11f4" e_inline="y" tranID="15" status="6">Please make sure you have all your belongings with you when leaving the plane.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>请确保在下飞机前带好所有的随身物品。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="thing_li_14" e_id="13cbac5155c.11f5" e_inline="y"><unsyn>goods</unsyn> <und margined="n"><label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><reg reg="tech"><xhtml:a href="helpr:specialist">technical</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk><or> or </or><reg-blk><q>rather</q> <reg reg="fml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:fml">formal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> possessions that can be moved<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指动产、（可搬运的）私人财产</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="thing_xgs_38" e_id="13cbac5155c.11f9"><x-g-blk eid="thing_xg_72"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="thing_x_72" e_id="13cbac5155c.11fb" e_inline="y" tranID="17" status="6">He was found guilty of <ebi>handling stolen goods</ebi>.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>他被判犯销赃罪。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="thing_li_15" e_id="13cbac5155c.11fd" e_inline="y"><unsyn>valuables</unsyn> <und margined="n"> things that are worth a lot of money, especially small personal things such as jewellery or cameras<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>尤指私人的贵重物品（如首饰、相机等）</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="thing_xgs_39" e_id="13cbac5155c.11ff"><x-g-blk eid="thing_xg_73"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="thing_x_73" e_id="13cbac5155c.1201" e_inline="y" tranID="19" status="6">Never leave cash or other valuables lying around.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>现金或其他贵重物品请勿乱放。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="thing_h3_1" e_id="13cbac5155c.1202" e_inline="y" tranID="34" status="1">Patterns</h3><ul eid="thing_ul_3" class="bullet" e_id="13cbac5155c.1203"><li eid="thing_li_16" e_id="13cbac5155c.1204" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>personal</eb>  things/stuff/property/possessions/belongings</und></li><li eid="thing_li_17" <h e_id="13cbabf992f.-4c5e">jun·ket</h><infl e_id="13cbabf992f.-4c5c"></infl><infl e_id="13cbabf992f.-4c5b"></infl><infl e_id="13cbabf992f.-4c5a"></infl><infl e_id="13cbabf992f.-4c59"></infl><pron e e_id="13cbabf992f.-486c"><body eid="justice_body_1" e_id="13cbabf992f.-486b"><title eid="justice_h1_1" e_id="13cbabf992f.-486a" e_inline="y"><titled tranID="44" status="2">Criminal justice<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>刑事审判</chn></titled></title><h2 eid="justice_h2_1" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4869" e_inline="y" tranID="1" status="6">Breaking the law<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>犯法</chn></h2><ul eid="justice_ul_1" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4868"><li eid="justice_li_1" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4867" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>break/violate/obey/uphold </eb>  the law<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>违反／违背／遵守／维护法律</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_2" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4865" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be investigated/arrested/tried for</eb>  a crime/a robbery/fraud<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>因犯罪／抢劫／诈骗而被调查／逮捕／审判</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_3" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4863" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be arrested/</eb>  <label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="n_am"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:am"><namelabel>NAmE</namelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk>  <eb>indicted/convicted</eb>  on charges of rape/fraud/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="usa"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:us"><em>US</em></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> felony charges<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>因被控犯强奸罪／诈骗罪／重型罪遭逮捕／起诉／定罪</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_4" e_id="13cbabf992f.-485c" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be arrested </eb>  on suspicion of arson/robbery/shoplifting<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>因涉嫌纵火／抢劫／在商店行窃而被逮捕</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_5" e_id="13cbabf992f.-485a" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be accused of/be charged with</eb>  murder/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="n_am"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:am"><namelabel>NAmE</namelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> homicide/four counts of fraud<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>被指控犯有谋杀罪／杀人罪／四项诈骗罪</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_6" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4856" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>face</eb>  two charges of indecent assault<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>面临两项猥亵罪的指控</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_7" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4854" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>admit</eb>  your guilt/liability/responsibility (for sth)<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>承认（对某事的）罪责／责任</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_8" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4852" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>deny</eb>  the allegations/claims/charges<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>否认指控</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_9" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4850" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>confess to</eb>  a crime<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>坦白罪行</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_10" e_id="13cbabf992f.-484e" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>grant/be refused/be released on/skip/jump</eb>  bail<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>准许／不准保释；交保释金获释；弃保潜逃</chn></und></li></ul><h2 eid="justice_h2_2" e_id="13cbabf992f.-484c" e_inline="y" tranID="12" status="6">The legal process<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>法律程序</chn></h2><ul eid="justice_ul_2" class="bullet" href="snd://_just__ams_25.spx"><audio-ams-liju>🔊</audio-ams-liju></a></rx-g></x-g-blk></x-gs><unbox type="british_american" Name="already / just / yet" eid="already_unbox_1" e_id="13cbaba1a9a.-538d"><body eid="already_body_1" e_id="13cbaba1a9a.-538c"><title eid="already_h1_1" e_id="13cbaba1a9a.-538b" e_inline="y"><titled tranID="10" status="1">already / just / yet</titled></title><ul eid="already_ul_1" class="bullet" e_id="13cbaba1a9a.-538a"><li eid="already_li_1" e_id="13cbaba1a9a.-5389" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>Already</eb>  and  <eb>yet</eb>  are usually used with the present perfect tense, but in <label-g-blk><label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="n_am"><xhtml:a href="helpg:am"><namelabel>NAmE</namelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g> </label-g-blk> they can also be used with the simple past tense.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>already 和 yet 通常与现在完成时连用，但在美式英语中还可与简单过去时连用</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="already_xgs_4" e_id="13cbaba1a9a.-5384"><x-g-blk eid="already_xg_7"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="already_x_7" e_id="13cbaba1a9a.-5382" e_inline="y" tranID="3" status="6">I already did it.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>我已经完成了。</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="already_xg_8"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="already_x_8" e_id="13cbaba1a9a.-5380" e_inline="y" tranID="5" status="6">Did you eat yet?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>你吃饭了吗？</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="already_li_2" e_id="13cbaba1a9a.-537f" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">However, this is much more common in spoken than in written English and some Americans do not consider it acceptable, even in speech. The present perfect is more common in <label-g-blk><label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="n_am"><xhtml:a href="helpg:am"><namelabel>NAmE</namelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g> </label-g-blk> and almost always used in <label-g-blk><label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="br"><xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g></label-g-blk>.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>不过，此用法多见于口语，而且有些美国人认为，即使在口语中此用法也不可取。在美式英语中较常用现在完成时，在英式英语中则几乎总是用现在完成时表示</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="already_xgs_5" e_id="13cbaba1a9a.-537a"><x-g-blk eid="already_xg_9"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="already_x_9" e_id="13cbaba1a9a.-5378" e_inline="y" tranID="7" status="6">I've already done it.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>我已经完成了。</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="already_xg_10"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="already_x_10" e_id="13cbaba1a9a.-5376" e_inline="y" tranID="9" status="6">Have you eaten yet?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>你吃饭了吗？</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="already_li_3" e_id="13cbaba1a9a.-5375" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>Just</eb>  is mostly used with the perfect tenses in <label-g-blk><label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="br"><xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g> </label-g-blk> and with the simple past in <label-g-blk><label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="n_am"><xhtml:a href="helpg:am"><namelabel>NAmE</namelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g></label-g-blk>.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>just 在英式英语中多与完成时连用，在美式英语中则多与一般过去时连用</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="already_xgs_6" e_id="13cbaba1a9a.-536f"><x-g-blk eid="already_xg_11"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="br"><xhtml:a just a minute/moment/second
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><idm-g e_id="13cbabf992f.-4988" eid="just_idmg_4"><top-g><idm-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-4986" eid="just_idm_4"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addid:13cbabf992f.-4986">●</xhtml:a></xsymb><idm e_id="13cbabf992f.-4986" eid="just_idm_4"><xhtml:a href="xi:just">just</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xi:a">a</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xi:minute">ˈminute</xhtml:a>/<xhtml:a href="xi:moment">ˈmoment</xhtml:a>/<xhtml:a href="xi:second">ˈsecond</xhtml:a></idm> <xhtml:a href="help:keypart"><symbol type="key">🔑</symbol></xhtml:a></idm-blk></top-g><sn-gs eid="just_sngs_5"><sn-blk><sn-g eid="just_sng_19" n=""><label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><reg e_id="13cbabf992f.-4982" reg="infml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:infml">informal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:used">used</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:ask">ask</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="help:sb">sb</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:wait">wait</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:for">for</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:a">a</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:short">short</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:time">time</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>稍等一会儿；请稍候</chn></def><x-gs eid="just_xgs_19"><x-g-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-497f" eid="just_xg_47"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addexample:13cbabf992f.-497f">◆</xhtml:a></xsymb><rx e eid="just_rxg_47" g href="just_rxg_47" resource="recx" source="ald9" targeteltid="13cba888321.1449"><x e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d6f2eaea.122a" eid="just_x_47" status="6" tranid="66" wd="'Is Mr Burns available?' href="snd://_justice__uss_5.spx"><audio-uss-liju>🔊</audio-uss-liju></a></rx-g></x-g-blk></x-gs><unbox type="colloc" Name="Criminal justice" eid="justice_unbox_1" e_id="13cbabf992f.-486c"><body eid="justice_body_1" e_id="13cbabf992f.-486b"><title eid="justice_h1_1" e_id="13cbabf992f.-486a" e_inline="y"><titled tranID="44" status="2">Criminal justice<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>刑事审判</chn></titled></title><h2 eid="justice_h2_1" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4869" e_inline="y" tranID="1" status="6">Breaking the law<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>犯法</chn></h2><ul eid="justice_ul_1" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4868"><li eid="justice_li_1" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4867" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>break/violate/obey/uphold </eb>  the law<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>违反／违背／遵守／维护法律</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_2" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4865" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be investigated/arrested/tried for</eb>  a crime/a robbery/fraud<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>因犯罪／抢劫／诈骗而被调查／逮捕／审判</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_3" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4863" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be arrested/</eb>  <label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="n_am"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:am"><namelabel>NAmE</namelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk>  <eb>indicted/convicted</eb>  on charges of rape/fraud/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="usa"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:us"><em>US</em></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> felony charges<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>因被控犯强奸罪／诈骗罪／重型罪遭逮捕／起诉／定罪</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_4" e_id="13cbabf992f.-485c" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be arrested </eb>  on suspicion of arson/robbery/shoplifting<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>因涉嫌纵火／抢劫／在商店行窃而被逮捕</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_5" e_id="13cbabf992f.-485a" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be accused of/be charged with</eb>  murder/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="n_am"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:am"><namelabel>NAmE</namelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> homicide/four counts of fraud<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>被指控犯有谋杀罪／杀人罪／四项诈骗罪</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_6" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4856" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>face</eb>  two charges of indecent assault<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>面临两项猥亵罪的指控</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_7" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4854" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>admit</eb>  your guilt/liability/responsibility (for sth)<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>承认（对某事的）罪责／责任</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_8" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4852" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>deny</eb>  the allegations/claims/charges<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>否认指控</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_9" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4850" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>confess to</eb>  a crime<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>坦白罪行</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_10" e_id="13cbabf992f.-484e" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>grant/be refused/be released on/skip/jump</eb>  bail<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>准许／不准保释；交保释金获释；弃保潜逃</chn></und></li></ul><h2 eid="justice_h2_2" e_id="13cbabf992f.-484c" e_inline="y" tranID="12" status="6">The legal process<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>法律程序</chn></h2><ul eid="justice_ul_2" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabf992f.-484b"><li eid="justice_li_11" e_id="13cbabf992f.-484a" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>stand/await/bring sb to/come to/be on</eb>  trial<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>受审；候审；把某人送交法院审判；开庭审理；受到审判</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_12" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4848" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>take sb to/come to/settle sth out of </eb>  court<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>把某人告上法庭；被法庭受理；庭外和解某事</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_13" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4846" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>face/avoid/escape</eb>  prosecution<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>面临／免于／逃脱起诉</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_14" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4844" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>seek/retain/have the right to/be denied access to</eb>  legal counsel<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>寻求／聘请／有权聘用／无权聘用律师</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_15" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4842" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>hold/conduct/attend/adjourn</eb>  a hearing/trial<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>开庭；出庭；休庭</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_16" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4840" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>sit on/influence/persuade/convince</eb>  the jury<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>担任／影响／说服陪审团</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_17" e_id="13cbabf992f.-483e" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>sit/stand/appear/be put/place sb</eb>  in the dock<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>坐在／站在／出现在／被送上／将某人送上被告席</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_18" e_id="13cbabf992f.-483c" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>plead</eb>  guilty/not guilty to a crime<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>认罪；不认罪</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_19" e_id="13cbabf992f.-483a" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be called to/enter</eb>  <label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="br"><xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> the witness box<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>被召唤进入／进入证人席</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_20" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4836" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>take/put sb on</eb>  the stand/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="n_am"><xhtml:a href="helpg:am"><namelabel>NAmE</namelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> the witness stand<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>出庭作证；让某人出庭作证</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_21" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4832" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>call/subpoena/question/cross-examine</eb>  a witness<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>传唤／以传票传唤／讯问／盘问证人</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_22" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4830" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>give/hear </eb>  the evidence against/on behalf of sb<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>提供／听取对某人不利／有利的证据</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_" e_id="13cbabf992f.-482e" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>raise/withdraw/overrule</eb>  an objection<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>提出／撤销／否决异议</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_24" e_id="13cbabf992f.-482c" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>reach</eb>  a unanimous/majority verdict<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>作出一致的／多数人赞同的裁决</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_25" e_id="13cbabf992f.-482a" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>return/deliver/record</eb>  a verdict of not guilty/unlawful killing/accidental death<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>作出／宣布无罪／非法杀人／意外死亡的裁决</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_26" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4828" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>convict/acquit</eb>  the defendant of the crime<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>宣判被告有罪／无罪</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_27" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4826" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>secure</eb>  a conviction/your acquittal<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>获得有罪／无罪判决</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_28" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4824" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>lodge/file </eb>  an appeal<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>提出上诉</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_29" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4822" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>appeal (against)/challenge/uphold/overturn</eb>  a conviction/verdict<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>对判决／裁决提出上诉／质疑；维持／撤销判决／裁决</chn></und></li></ul><h2 eid="justice_h2_3" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4820" e_inline="y" tranID="32" status="6">Sentencing and punishment<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>判刑与惩罚</chn></h2><ul eid="justice_ul_3" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabf992f.-481f"><li eid="justice_li_30" e_id="13cbabf992f.-481e" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>pass</eb>  sentence on sb<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>宣布对某人的判决</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_31" e_id="13cbabf992f.-481c" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>carry/face/serve</eb>  a seven-year/life sentence<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>会被判处／面临／服七年徒刑／无期徒刑</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_32" e_id="13cbabf992f.-481a" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>receive/be given</eb>  the death penalty<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>被判死刑</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_33" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4818" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be sentenced to</eb>  ten years (in prison/jail)<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>被判十年（监禁）</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_34" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4816" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>carry/impose/pay</eb>  a fine (of $3 000)/a penalty (of 14 years imprisonment)<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>会被判处／处以／缴纳（3 000 美元的）罚金／（14 年的）监禁</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_35" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4814" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be imprisoned/jailed for</eb>  drug possession/fraud/murder<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>因持有毒品罪／诈骗罪／谋杀罪被监禁</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_36" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4812" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>do/serve</eb>  time/ten years<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>服刑；服十年徒刑</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_37" e_id="13cbabf992f.-4810" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be sent to/put sb in/be released from</eb>  jail/prison<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>被送进监狱；把某人送进监狱；被释放出狱</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_38" e_id="13cbabf992f.-480e" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be/put sb/spend X years</eb>  on death row<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>在／把某人关在死囚牢房；在死囚牢房度过…年</chn></und></li><li eid="justice_li_39" e_id="13cbabf992f.-480c" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be granted/be denied/break (your)</eb>  parole<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>获准假释；假释遭拒；违反假释规定</chn></und></li></ul><xr-gs xt="collocat"><xrhead> <arrow>➡</arrow> <xrbold><b>collocations</b></xrbold> at</xrhead><xr-g-blk><xr-g> <xh><xhtml:a do for other reasons<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指为自己行为所作的辩护、借口、理由</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="reason_xgs_10" e_id="13cbac3027d.-863"><x-g-blk eid="reason_xg_35"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="reason_x_35" e_id="13cbac3027d.-861" e_inline="y" tranID="9" status="6">Late again! What's your excuse this time?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>又迟到了！你这次有什么借口？</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="reason_xg_36"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="reason_x_36" e_id="13cbac3027d.-85f" e_inline="y" tranID="11" status="6">It gave me an excuse to take the car.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>这使我有理由开车去了。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="reason_li_13" e_id="13cbac3027d.-85e" e_inline="y"><unsyn>motive</unsyn> <und margined="n"> a reason that explains sb's behaviour<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指动机、原因</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="reason_xgs_11" e_id="13cbac3027d.-85c"><x-g-blk eid="reason_xg_37"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="reason_x_37" e_id="13cbac3027d.-85a" e_inline="y" tranID="13" status="6">There seemed to be no motive for the murder.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>这起谋杀案看不出有什么动机。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="reason_li_14" e_id="13cbac3027d.-859" e_inline="y"><unsyn>justification</unsyn> <und margined="n"> <label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><q>rather</q> <reg reg="fml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:fml">formal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> a good reason why sth exists or is done<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指事物存在或做某事的正当理由</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="reason_xgs_12" e_id="13cbac3027d.-856"><x-g-blk eid="reason_xg_38"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="reason_x_38" e_id="13cbac3027d.-854" e_inline="y" tranID="17" status="6">I can see no possible justification for any further tax increases.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>我看不出还能提出什么理由来加税了。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="reason_h3_1" e_id="13cbac3027d.-853" e_inline="y" tranID="18" status="6">grounds or justification?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>用 grounds 还是 justification？</chn></h3><p eid="reason_p_2" e_id="13cbac3027d.-852" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>Justification</eb>  is used to talk about finding or understanding reasons for actions, or trying to explain why it is a good idea to do sth. It is often used with words like <ei eid="reason_ei_4" e_id="13cbac3027d.-850">little</ei>, <ei eid="reason_ei_5" e_id="13cbac3027d.-84f">no</ei>, <ei eid="reason_ei_6" e_id="13cbac3027d.-84e">some</ei>, <ei eid="reason_ei_7" e_id="13cbac3027d.-84d">every</ei>, <ei eid="reason_ei_8" e_id="13cbac3027d.-84c">without</ei>, and <ei eid="reason_ei_9" e_id="13cbac3027d.-84b">not any</ei>.  <eb>Grounds</eb>  is used more for talking about reasons that already exist, or that have already been decided, for example by law: <ei eid="reason_ei_10" e_id="13cbac3027d.-849">moral/economic grounds</ei>.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>justification 用来表示找出或明白做事的理由，或解释要做的事，常与 little、no、some、every、without 和 not any 等词连用。grounds 多指已存在的原因或已决定的（如法律上的）根据：moral/economic grounds（道德／经济原因）。</chn></und></p><ul eid="reason_ul_3" class="deflist" e_id="13cbac3027d.-848"><li eid="reason_li_15" e_id="13cbac3027d.-847" e_inline="y"><unsyn>pretext</unsyn> <und margined="n"> <label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><q>rather</q> <reg reg="fml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:fml">formal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> a false reason that you give for doing sth, usually sth bad, in order to hide the real reason<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指为掩盖做某事（通常为不好的事）的真正理由而找的借口、托辞</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="reason_xgs_13" e_id="13cbac3027d.-844"><x-g-blk eid="reason_xg_39"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="reason_x_39" e_id="13cbac3027d.-842" e_inline="y" tranID="23" status="6">He left the party early on the pretext of having to work.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>他借口有事要处理，早早离开了聚会。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="reason_h3_2" e_id="13cbac3027d.-841" e_inline="y" tranID="45" status="1">Patterns</h3><ul eid="reason_ul_4" class="bullet" e_id="13cbac3027d.-840"><li eid="reason_li_16" e_id="13cbac3027d.-83f" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">(a/an) reason/explanation/grounds/basis/excuse/motive/justification/pretext  <eb>for</eb>  sth</und></li><li eid="reason_li_17" e_id="13cbac3027d.-83d" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">the reason/motive  <eb>behind</eb>  sth</und></li><li eid="reason_li_18" e_id="13cbac3027d.-83b" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>on the</eb>  grounds/basis/pretext  <eb>of/that…</eb> </und></li><li eid="reason_li_19" e_id="13cbac3027d.-838" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">(a)  <eb>good/valid</eb>  reason/explanation/grounds/excuse/motive/justification</und></li></ul></body></unbox></sn-g></sn-blk-nolist></sn-gs><idm-gs-blk><boxblock><xhtml:a href="help:id"><img src="idioms.svg"></xhtml:a></boxblock><idm-gs eid="justification_idmgs_1"><idm-g eid="justification_idmg_1"><top-g><idm-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-4776" eid="justification_idm_1"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addid:13cbabf992f.-4776">●</xhtml:a></xsymb><idm e_id="13cbabf992f.-4776" eid="justification_idm_1"><xhtml:a href="xi:in">in</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xi:justification">justifiˈcation</xhtml:a> (<xhtml:a href="xi:of">of</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xi:sb">sb</xhtml:a>/<xhtml:a href="xi:sth">sth</xhtml:a>)</idm></idm-blk></top-g><sn-gs eid="justification_sngs_2"><sn-blk><sn-g eid="justification_sng_2" n=""><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:as">as</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:an">an</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:explanation">explanation</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:of">of</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:why">why</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="help:sth">sth</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:exists">exists</xhtml:a> eid="justification_xg_3"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addexample:13cbabf992f.-4771">◆</xhtml:a></xsymb><rx e eid="justification_rxg_3" g href="justification_rxg_3" resource="recx" source="ald9" targeteltid="13cba888321.14dc"><x e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.1f34c209.141c12ef5c9.5cd8" eid="justification_x_3" status="6" tranid="5" wd="All I can say in justification of her actions is that she was under a lot of pressure at work."><xhtml:a href="x:All">All</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="x:I">I</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="x:can">can</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="x:say">say</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a just like that
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><idm-g eid="just_idmg_5"><top-g><idm-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-497b" eid="just_idm_5"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addid:13cbabf992f.-497b">●</xhtml:a></xsymb><idm e_id="13cbabf992f.-497b" eid="just_idm_5"><xhtml:a href="xi:just">just</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xi:like">like</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xi:that">ˈthat</xhtml:a></idm></idm-blk></top-g><sn-gs eid="just_sngs_6"><sn-blk><sn-g eid="just_sng_20" n=""><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:suddenly">suddenly</xhtml:a>, <xhtml:a href="d:without">without</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:warning">warning</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:or">or</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:explanation">explanation</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>（就是那样）突如其来，冷不防，不加解释</chn></def></sn-g></sn-blk></sn-gs></idm-g><div class="seealso">See also <a href="entry://just">just</a></div>

just/merely/only a question of (sth/doing sth)
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><idm-g
